game.name: DCS: MAD AH-64D Campaign
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: And the battle rages on! This time you are an officer of the UAE Air Force, with Bedouin ancestry; a pilot of the Special Operations Squadron - Captain Khalid Al-Mansouri. You will take part in a series of interesting campaigns; MAD - Mutual Assured Destruction.
game.shortDescriptionEn: And the battle rages on! This time you are an officer of the UAE Air Force, with Bedouin ancestry; a pilot of the Special Operations Squadron - Captain Khalid Al-Mansouri. You will take part in a series of interesting campaigns; MAD - Mutual Assured Destruction.
